item.title: Reference
item.description: [1] H. Wen, H. Xing and O. Simeone, “Pre-Training and Personalized Fine-Tuning via Over-the-Air Federated Meta-Learning: Convergence-Generalization Trade-Offs,” submitted to IEEE Transaction on Signal Processing. URL: https://arxiv.org/abs/2406.11569. [2] H. Wen, H. Xing and O. Simeone, ”Convergence Analysis of Over-the-Air FL with Compression and Power Control via Clipping,“ GLOBECOM 2023 - 2023 IEEE Global Communications Conference, pp. 267-272, 2023. URL: https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.11135. [3] H. Wen, N. Michelusi, O. Simeone and H. Xing, “NCAirFL: CSI-Free Over-the-Air Federated Learning Based on Non-Coherent Detection,” submitted to 2025 IEEE International Conference on Communications.

item.title: Demo Page
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
